title: Rosie the Riveter WWII Home Front National Historical Park: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps          Welcome To Our Maps Page This page will provide you with various maps for the Rosie the Riveter WWII/Home Front National Historical Park, and other places of interest that will compliment your park experience. Some maps are provided in pdf. form. Please don't hesitate to call the Visitor Education Center at 510-232-5050, if you have any questions regarding directions or suggestions about our park.       Rosie the Riveter WWII NHP Map Below, is the suggested driving and interest map for the Rosie the Riveter Home Front park area. The map indicates the location of our Visitor Education Center as well as historic buildings and areas of the city that were an important part of the WWII Home Front. The National Park Service does not own these structures or areas but can provide interpretive education to help you understand their importance. The map provides the best driving routes to help you navigate throughout the city of Richmond to reach each destination.  Keep in mind that we suggest you first visit the Visitor Education Center, before exploring. If you would like to download the driving map (pdf.), you may do so with the provided link. Otherwise, you may pick up a tear-off version of this map for free at our Visitor Education Center. Download Driving Map By Clicking Here.          Driving map of the city of Richmond, CA which indicates areas of interest of the Rosie the Riveter WWII/Home Front National Historical Park       Rosie the Riveter/WWII Home Front National Historical Park    Location of the Rosie the Riveter/WWII Home Front National Historical Park, Visitor Education Center in Richmond, CA.      Bay Trail Map For The East Bay  The link bellow provides a pdf. format of the Bay Trail as it winds it way through the East Bay. The map is long and narrow and best viewed on 11X17 paper or zoomed in on. If you would like more precise information about the trail, you may visit the website with the links listed below.  (Detailed) San Francisco Bay Trail Map of East Bay  (Wide Area) San Francisco Bay Trail Map of East Bay  For more information on the San Franciso Bay Trail, click here.
